original: @349a # // sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa //
analyzed: @349a # // sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa //
translated: Verses of Auspiciousness of the Seven Generations of Buddhas

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can //
analyzed: bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can //
translated: The Bhagavān Vipaśyin, of the warrior caste, majestic,

original: tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du //
analyzed: tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du //
translated: At the time when the human lifespan was eighty thousand years, in the city of Rājagṛha,

original: shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: At the foot of a śirīṣa tree, attained perfect buddhahood.🔽May the auspiciousness of the Sugata be perfect here today!

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: The Sugata Śikhin, of the warrior caste, with miraculous powers,

original: tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du //
analyzed: tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du //
translated: At the time when the human lifespan was seventy thousand years, in the city of Sukhā,

original: shing mchog sundha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: shing mchog sundha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: At the foot of a sundari tree, attained perfect buddhahood.🔽May the auspiciousness of the Sugata be perfect here today!

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can //
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can //
translated: The Jina Viśvabhū, of the warrior caste, wise,

original: tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du //
analyzed: tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du //
translated: At the time when the human lifespan was sixty thousand years, in the city of Anupamā,

original: shing mchog s'a la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: shing mchog s'a la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: He attained perfect buddhahood in front of the supreme sāla tree.🔽May the Sugata’s excellent auspiciousness be perfect here today!

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs //
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs //
translated: The Sage Krakucchanda, the Bhagavān, was of the brahmin caste.

original: tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du //
analyzed: tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du //
translated: At a time when the human lifespan was forty thousand years,🔽he attained perfect buddhahood in the city of Bhadraṃkara,

original: shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: in front of a śirīṣa tree.🔽May the Sugata’s excellent auspiciousness be perfect here today!

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs //
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs //
translated: The Leader Kanakamuni, of the brahmin caste, possessed the highest training.

original: tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du //
analyzed: tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du //
translated: At a time when the human lifespan was thirty thousand years,🔽he attained perfect buddhahood in the city of Puṇḍravardhana,

original: au dum+wa'i ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: au dum+wa'i ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: in front of an udumbara tree.

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig //
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig //
translated: May the Sugata’s excellent auspiciousness be perfect here today!

original: skyob pa 'od srungs rgyal rigs bla med yon @349b tan can //
analyzed: skyob pa 'od srungs rgyal rigs bla med yon @349b tan can //
translated: The Protector Kāśyapa, of the royal caste, possessed the highest qualities.

original: tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na b'a r'a na s'i ru //
analyzed: tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na b'a r'a na s'i ru //
translated: At a time when the human lifespan was twenty thousand years,🔽in Vārāṇasī,

original: n+ya gro dha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: n+ya gro dha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: And attained perfect buddhahood at the foot of the nyagrodha tree,🔽May the Sugata's auspiciousness be perfect here today.

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'gro mgon sh'akya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can //
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'gro mgon sh'akya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can //
translated: The protector of beings, Shakyamuni, a diligent member of the warrior caste,

original: tshe lo brgya ba'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du //
analyzed: tshe lo brgya ba'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du //
translated: At the time when the human lifespan was one hundred years, in the city of Kapila,

original: aa shvattha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: aa shvattha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: Attained perfect buddhahood at the foot of the ashwaththa tree,🔽May the Sugata's auspiciousness be perfect here today.

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang //
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang //
translated: The perfect auspiciousness of the seven lineages of buddhas,

original: phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin rlabs rmad byung ba //
analyzed: phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin rlabs rmad byung ba //
translated: The marvelous blessings of the Sugatas of all directions and times,

original: chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur ba //
translated: The unchanging power of the pure dharmadhatu's interdependence,🔽May the Sugata's auspiciousness be perfect here today.

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig / sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The verses of auspiciousness of the seven lineages of buddhas are complete.
